service.name: Assurance of Support Scheme
service.description: The Assurance of Support Scheme (AOS) provides a means for intending migrants who do not meet the conditions for independent admission to Australia, to enter under the assurance that an Australian resident or organisation will support them. The person who, or organisation which, elects to assure the intending migrant signs an agreement called an Assurance of Support, and is known as the assurer.
